Newton.Second Church in Newton: The Second Church in Newton, United Church of Christ, is located at 60 Highland Street in West Newton, a village of Newton, Massachusetts. The congregation was founded 1764 and formally recognized in as Newton's West Parish in 1778; it was Newton's second parish. Its present church building, a Gothic Victorian structure designed by Allen & Collens and completed in 1916, was listed in the National Register of Historic Places (as "Second Church of Newton") in 1990.
